name: Reprobel
membership: International Federation of Reproduction Rights Organisations (IFRRO)
goal: Reprobel is the Belgian central collecting society responsible for the collection and distribution among authors and publishers of legal licence remunerations for reprography and for public lending.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
Copyright in the Information Society,
CRM Directive,
EU Collective Rights Management Directive,
GDPR,
WIPO Marrakesh Treaty
